author: Nick Nairn
method: Mix the onion, avocado and caster sugar in a large bowl. Stir in the lime juice, chilli flakes and seasoning.  Spoon the mixture onto a serving plate and serve.
ingredients: ¼ red onion, peeled and finely chopped,  ½ avocado, peeled and diced,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  squeeze lime juice,  pinch chilli flakes,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
